divs: Sighting Detailsm57 Ring Nebula just east of it. Two lights become brighter and move north east and faint out after 3 minutes or so. Today the two lights are there again not moving no other start in the chart showing this might be lights not stars?
Summary: Moving Light became bright then faded
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Hughson
There were no other sightings in Hughson on or around September 3rd 2013
